channel.title: Again ip ban

item.title: Again ip ban
item.dc:creator: @Justelis Justelis
item.description:
@Justelis wrote:

This is around

[code]public void appendToBanned (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedusers.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning user!");
 }
  }

}

if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Vanack”))) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) {
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom);
}
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is IPbanning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully IPbanned”);
}

public void appendToMacroWarn (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/macrowarn.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error giving warning!");
 }
  }

}
[/code]

Read full topic

item.description:

A bit off-topic, but I didn’t know anyone still used that compiler of mine.

System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is IPbanning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully IPbanned”);
